description:
Hiraizumi Eiichi is the Kaimei High School baseball club`s reserve pitcher who is questioned as a potential suspect in the "Glass Man" investigation. He appears to be in a relationship with the club`s manager, Sakiko and promised to take her to Koushien. He has very poor aim and silently practices his pitching every morning despite not being a regular on the team.
Source: sketdance.wikia.com
name: Hiraizumi Eiichi
